board.title: Game Board
board.description:
The Minesweeper game board consists of tiles arranged in a grid.
Some of the tiles hide mines.

objective.title: Objective
objective.description: Avoid opening mines and uncover all tiles without mines.

open.title: Revealing Tiles
open.description: Click on a tile to reveal it, and it will show one of the following:

number.title: Number
number.description:
Indicates the number of mines hidden in the eight adjacent tiles.
Use this information to deduce the positions of the mines.

blank.title: Blank
blank.description:
Indicates that there are no mines in the surrounding tiles.
Additionally, adjacent tiles will automatically open.
If there are consecutive blanks, they will open in a chain reaction.

mine.title: Mine
mine.description: Revealing a mine will result in a game over.

flag.title: Placing Flags
flag.description:
To prevent accidental tile reveals, 
you can place a flag on tiles that you suspect contain mines.
Right-click on the tile (or long-press on touch devices) to place a flag.
